notes: Packet-003 wrapper script completed with workflow_scenarios case_count=565 pass_count=565.

workflow_gate_runs.command: rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_workflow_scenario_gate -- --log-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-003/workflow_scenario_packet003_e2e.jsonl --artifact-index-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-003/workflow_scenario_packet003_artifact_index.json --report-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-003/workflow_scenario_packet003_reliability.json --retries 1 --flake-budget 0 --coverage-floor 1.0

quality_gates.command: rch exec -- cargo test -p fnp-conformance workflow_scenario_suite_is_green -- --nocapture

notes: Workflow step logs continue to include fixture_id, seed, mode, env_fingerprint, artifact_refs, and reason_code via WorkflowScenarioLogEntry.
